document_data.name: ''Staff of Deadly Splinters''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of deadly splinters''''' was an [[enchanted]] ancient [[quarterstaff]] found in the [[Elven Catacombs]] of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: The ''staff of deadly splinters'' appeared to be a simple slab of thorny wood.
document_data.Powers: The weapon allowed the wielder to cast a powerful version of the ''[[harm]]'' [[spell]] at will. The ''staff of deadly splinters'' contained five charges of the spell.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a ''staff of deadly splinters'' could be found in the Elven Catacombs of Myth Drannor, among the treasures claimed by the [[Cult of the Dragon]] usurpers, allied with the [[drow]] of [[House Freth]].
